Package gov.noaa.ngs.transform

Class CoordinateTransformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.noaa.ngs.transform.CoordinateTransformation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AETransformation, LambertTransformation, LCSTransformation, OMTransformation, TMTransformation, XyzTransformation
    public abstract class CoordinateTransformation
extends java.lang.Object
    A base class for coordinate transformation
    Version:
    1.0 Date: 06/10/2011
    Author:
    Krishna Tadepalli

        converts decimal degrees to DMS
        Parameters:
        decimalDegree - decimal degrees
        Returns:
        a white space delimited DMS. Seconds formatted per seconds format

      • toDMS

        public static java.lang.String toDMS​(double decimalDegree,
                                     boolean isLat)
        converts decimal degrees to formatted DMS caller should validate decimal degrees
        Parameters:
        decimalDegree - decimal degrees
        isLat - true=latitude used for conversion
        Returns:
        DMS with a hemisphere designator

        Returns:
